description: That the job market in Phoenix can affect a child's education in Mexico may strain credulity, but it's nevertheless true, according to a recent paper co-authored by Brian Cadena, a University of Colorado Boulder associate professor of economics.
title: US labor market can affect 'people who are not even here'

description: Many animals can glow in the dark. Fireflies famously blink on summer evenings. But most animals that light up are found in the depths of the ocean.
title: The first glow-in-the-dark animals may have been ancient corals deep in the ocean

description: We are all very familiar with the concept of the Earth's magnetic field. It turns out that most objects in space have magnetic fields but it's quite tricky to measure them. Astronomers have developed an ingenious way to measure the magnetic field of the Milky Way using polarized light from interstellar dust grains that align themselves to the magnetic field lines. A new survey has begun this mapping process and has mapped an area that covers the equivalent of 15 times the full moon.
title: Mapping the Milky Way's magnetic field in 3D

description: Once known only to those studying biology, the word symbiosis is now widely used. Symbiosis is the intimate relationship of different species living together. It's much more common and older than many of us might realize.
title: Species living closely together in symbiosis is far older and way more common than you might think

description: A groundbreaking study, led by Dr. Mark Wong of The University of Western Australia, has provided the first global picture of insect activity patterns across the fundamental day–night cycle.
title: Global study shows a third more insects come out after dark

description: They're loud. They're sexually aroused. And for one special, cacophonous month up to a trillion of them will engulf suburbs and woodlands across America.
title: Cicada-palooza! Billions of bugs to blanket America

description: As the sun sets on another scorching Yangon day, the hot and bothered descend on the Myanmar city's parks, the coolest place to spend an evening during yet another power blackout.
title: 'Everyone sits out': Yangon parks offer heat wave relief

description: Imagine predicting the exact finishing order of the Kentucky Derby from a still photograph taken 10 seconds into the race.
title: Getting dynamic information from static snapshots

description: For sports fans, places like Fenway Park, Wembley Stadium or Wimbledon's Centre Court are practically hallowed ground.
title: Ancient Maya blessed their ballcourts: Researchers find evidence of ceremonial offerings in Mexico

description: NASA has finally heard back from Voyager 1 again in a way that makes sense.
title: NASA hears from Voyager 1, the most distant spacecraft from Earth, after months of quiet

description: It's not just another ride for a pair of veteran NASA astronauts who arrived to the Space Coast ahead of their flight onboard Boeing's CST-100 Starliner.
title: Astronauts arrive at Kennedy Space Center as first crew for Boeing's Starliner spacecraft
